title: nEramu lenaka
sahitya:
nEramu lennaka brOvumu vEgamE nIrajadaLa nayana shrI rAma

anupallavi

 dAri tappi samsAramanE mahA vAridhilO baDi durakuDagu nA

caraNam 1

 dEva dEva vErE dikki lEdanucu bhAvamulO ninu bhakti sEvincucu 
kAvu kAvumani moraliDagA munu kAkAsuruni brOcinaTula nA
 
caraNam 2

 nITilOnamakari cAtajikki pATu paDucununna gajamunu jUci 
sAtlEni daivamu nEnEyani sAkSAtkAramai brOcinaTula nA
 
caraNam 3

 bhUmini bhadrAdri rAmadAsula brOcina doravani vini sharaNaNtini 
rAmacandrapura vara shrI vEnkaTaramaNa bhAgavata tanayuDugAna
